title: Ashes of Wars
description: In "Ashes of Wars" Radka Yakimov narrates the story of the descendants of two Bulgarian sisters. Reconstructed historically on the basis of recorded facts, stories handed down from generation to generation, and her personal recollections, Yakimov chronicles the main events that impact four generations of Bulgarians throughout the twentieth century. Yakimov takes her readers beyond the confines of Bulgaria into Yugoslavia, to a refugee camp in Trieste, and finally to new lives in Canada and USA.
author: Radka Yakimov
